comments.body: The short answer is no.  There are some caveats if you're using GNU zip, but in reality we should switch to using tar, which does more sensible things.  In any case, this is just keeping the same behavior we had previously.  We can improve it in future iterations.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +62,66 @@    Darwin)
      download_artifacts darwin-x64
      chmod a+x "$ENGINE_ARTIFACT_PATH/darwin-x64/sky_snapshot"
      ;;
    Linux)

comments.body: This is really just the Dart description of the engine API.

diffHunk:

  echo "Downloading Flutter engine $ENGINE_VERSION..."
  ENGINE_PKG_URL="$BASE_URL/sky_engine.zip"
